email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Houston to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

We are looking to ship 12,000MT of wheat from Houston to Shanghai on CIF terms. Can you provide a quote and confirm vessel availability for a laycan of November 10-15?

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Houston to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY (DWT: 50,000, LOA: 200m) for your shipment. The starting freight quote is USD 55/MT. Laycan is November 10-15. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Houston to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 55/MT seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Houston to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Given the current market, I can offer USD 52/MT. Demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata. Loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if you need any more details.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Houston to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 52/MT sounds better. Can we lock in the OCEAN HARMONY with a laycan of November 10-15? Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
Alex
